# Callback delegate

```csharp
public delegate void Callback(IntPtr widget, IntPtr data);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| widget | Transfer ownership: none |
| data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
